description: KuCoin exchange is one of the top digital asset trading platforms in the world. Furthermore, the crypto exchange flaunts of serving one out of every four crypto holders internationally. Since its establishment, the exchange has expanded its services, hosting over 300 employees in 207 countries.
name: Kucoin
